channel.title: Need help! idk what to do! just port problem look! not port forwarding!

item.title: Need help! idk what to do! just port problem look! not port forwarding!
item.dc:creator: @santahat2m santahat2m
item.description:
@santahat2m wrote:

kk i have a server up! www.runescape508.org but you have to download client!!! kk everything is there and how can i make it where people just join my game and not there own i have hamachi plus port is open but on my webclient people are going to there own port how do i fix it where not going to there own and they go to mine? can you please check it for me? r tell me what to do here my codes…
hamachi name is “Npro and pass is 123” do i put that in there are do they have to download hamachi? an log on it it then the game?

misc.println(“wont change online on port 43594 - santa hat 2m is online’ and change it…-Thomas”);
while (true) {
try {
java.net.Socket s = clientListener.accept();
s.setTcpNoDelay(true);
String connectingHost = s.getInetAddress().getHostName();
if ( /*
* connectingHost.startsWith(“localhost”) ||
* connectingHost.equals(“5.185.216.149”)
*/true) {
if (connectingHost.contains(“Hamchi Network Interface”)) {
misc.println(“Checking Server Status…”);
s.close();
} else {
connections.add(connectingHost);
if (checkHost(connectingHost)) {
misc.println("Connection from "
+ connectingHost + “:” + s.getPort());
playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingHost);
} else {
misc.println("ClientHandler: Rejected "
+ connectingHost + “:” + s.getPort());
